com.github.triceo.splitlog

Interface MergingFollower

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommonFollower

    public interface MergingFollower
extends CommonFollower
    Follower that is capable of merging multiple Followers. Merged followers must obey the following rules:
    • They receive all messages that their getMerged() receive. It is left to the discretion of users to CommonFollower.waitFor(com.github.triceo.splitlog.conditions.MessageDeliveryCondition) any message or just for messages from a particular MessageDeliveryNotificationSource.
    • Their CommonFollower.tag(String) doesn't affect any tags in their getMerged(). They will always be added on top and not propagated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<? extends Follower> getMerged()
      Retrieve followers that are currently part of this merge.
      boolean isFollowing()
      Whether or not this follower is still capable of receiving any new messages.
      boolean separate(Follower f)
      Will remove the follower from getMerged().

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.triceo.splitlog.CommonFollower

        getMessages, getMessages, getMessages, getMessages, mergeWith, tag, waitFor, waitFor, write, write, write, write, write, write, write, write

    • Method Detail

      • isFollowing

        boolean isFollowing()
        Whether or not this follower is still capable of receiving any new messages.
        Returns:
        True if any of getMerged()'s isFollowing() is true.

      • separate

        boolean separate(Follower f)
        Will remove the follower from getMerged(). As a result, this merge will act as if it never knew of this follower. It is the responsibility of this method to notify the Follower to no longer notify of new messages.
        Parameters:
        f - The follower to remove from the merge.
        Returns:
        True if the follower was part of the merge, false if it was already separate or never merged.

      • getMerged

        Collection<? extends Follower> getMerged()
        Retrieve followers that are currently part of this merge.
        Returns:
        Unmodifiable collections of followers in this merge.
